properties.description: Here 4 U provides care for elderly people who need that extra bit of support coping with memory loss or loss of mobility. Our service will also give the partner/ carer valued respite, happy in the knowledge that their loved one is in a safe, caring and supportive environment. Each day we will put on various activities i.e dance, quizzes, theme talks, gardening. included in the daily rate home cooked meal all refreshments and afternoon tea.
